thread.title: Really Wanna Piss Trump Off? Here's How to Turn His Tweets Into "Child's Scribble"
thread.title_full: Really Wanna Piss Trump Off? Here's How to Turn His Tweets Into "Child's Scribble"

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Really Wanna Piss Trump Off? Here's How to Turn His Tweets Into "Child's Scribble"
text:
For those of you who didn’t have internet access until, like, right now, President Donald Trump has spent one half* of his four weeks in office tweeting. For those of you who couldn’t read until, like, now, his tweets read as though he handed his phone to a hangry eight-year-old.
Noting this, the brilliant minds at The Daily Show went ahead and created a browser extension that quite literally changes Trump’s tweets from whatever regular Twitter font is to “child scribble.” Introducing MakeTrumpTweetsEightAgain.com .
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below It’s pretty simple. You click here to add the extension. You go to Donald Trump's Twitter feed. You go to POTUS’s Twitter feed. You desk-chortle in delight. Rinse. Repeat.
